action.content: Write a funny poem for kids about a product that you would like to sell. The poem should have exactly 6 stanzas. Separated the stanzas using 3 asterisk markers: ***
action.label: context

action.content:
*** 

I have a product that's super cool,
It's a toy that's fun, it's a treat for you,
It's a robot that can dance and play,
And it's powered by batteries all day!

It's got wheels and a body so bright,
It can spin around with all its might,
It's got a face that's happy and wide,
And it's ready to be your new best friend inside!

It's not just a toy, it's a work of art,
A masterpiece that's fun to start,
It's got buttons and levers to press,
And it makes sounds that are super nice, I guess!

It's a robot that's easy to use,
Just turn it on and it will amuse,
It's got a special mode for fun and play,
And it's the perfect toy for a sunny day!

It's not just for kids, it's for all ages too,
A fun and silly toy that's fun to do,
It's a robot that's full of surprises and delight,
And it's the perfect gift for a birthday night!

So if you're looking for a toy that's fun and new,
A robot that's powered by batteries too,
Then look no further, this is the one,
It's the perfect toy for everyone, it's number one!
action.label: response
